name: Target Practice (itch) (Mark Keeble)
description:
Just a fun little clicking game. 

There are 3 modes: Regular, Sandbox, and Timed

Regular: Settings are built-in, defined by myself for (relatively) reasonable gameplay.

Sandbox: You can edit settings as you please, and the next time spawning occurs, the spawning will reflect these new settings.

Timed: You're able to set up the initial settings, and you must give yourself a certain allotted amount of time. You will have that amount of time to try to score as many points as you can.
